backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing contact submissions with basic validation and per‑caller rate limiting, and exposing submit and query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing addition of a user‑uploaded image to frontend assets and related configuration changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files covering components, config, hooks, styles, and assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes with global style rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file setting SEO and Open Graph metadata and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling all site sections and syncing SEO metadata from config.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component rendering branding, quick links, and attribution with smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/sections/Arduino: Section displaying Arduino code with dynamic threshold, copy‑to‑clipboard, and descriptive UI.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact form component with validation, submission via custom hook, and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/DemoMed: Displays demo video and images if available, otherwise shows a placeholder message.
frontend/src/components/sections/Feature: Renders a grid of feature cards with titles and descriptions plus an icon banner.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with project name, tagline, background image, and scroll or external link CTAs.
frontend/src/components/sections/ManualS: User manual section outlining required components and wiring instructions for a DHT11 system.
frontend/src/components/sections/Overvie: Simple section that displays a project overview paragraph.
frontend/src/components/sections/Practic: Shows real‑world applications with icons, logic steps, daily benefits, and a hysteresis note alert.
frontend/src/components/sections/TechSta: Lists the project's tech stack using styled badges.
frontend/src/components/sections/Thresho: React component that simulates temperature changes and displays motor status based on a threshold value.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Responsive top navigation bar with scroll detection, mobile menu, and smooth section navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query hook that fetches all contacts using the current backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContact.ts: Hook that submits a contact form and manages loading, success, and error states.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with custom color themes, animations, and base CSS rules.
frontend/src/lib/backendClient.ts: Caches the backend actor and exposes helper functions for submitting and fetching contact data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/siteConfig.ts: Defines static site configuration including project details, features, applications, and SEO metadata.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata describing the ICP dapp scaffold, its features, generated assets, and architectural notes.
